entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 70. High 18. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 20 km/h. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
